publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1486 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Consideration of SSI—That the Parliament agrees that nothing further be done under the Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/36).

S3M-1486 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Consideration of SSI—That the Parliament agrees that nothing further be done under the Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/36).
